javadoc: FileSystemListener provides a listener the ability to be notified of folder and file changes within a FileSystem.

methods.name: folderCreated
methods.comment: Notification that a new folder was created.

params.name: parentPath
params.comment: the path of the folder that contains the new folder

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the new folder

methods.name: itemCreated
methods.comment: Notification that a new folder item was created.

params.name: parentPath
params.comment: the path of the folder that contains the new item.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the new item.

methods.name: folderDeleted
methods.comment: Notification that a folder was deleted.

params.name: parentPath
params.comment: the path of the folder that contained the deleted folder.

params.name: folderName
params.comment: the name of the folder that was deleted.

methods.name: folderMoved
methods.comment: Notification that a folder was moved.

params.name: parentPath
params.comment: the path of the folder that used to contain the moved folder.

params.name: folderName
params.comment: the name of the folder that was moved.

params.name: newParentPath
params.comment: the path of the folder that now contains the moved folder.

methods.name: folderRenamed
methods.comment: Notification that a folder was renamed.

params.name: parentPath
params.comment: the path of the folder containing the folder that was renamed.

params.name: oldFolderName
params.comment: the old name of the folder.

params.name: newFolderName
params.comment: the new name of the folder.

methods.name: itemDeleted
methods.comment: Notification that a folder item was deleted.

params.name: folderPath
params.comment: the path of the folder that contained the deleted item.

params.name: itemName
params.comment: the name of the item that was deleted.

methods.name: itemRenamed
methods.comment: Notification that an item was renamed.

params.name: folderPath
params.comment: the path of the folder that contains the renamed item

params.name: oldItemName
params.comment: the old name of the item.

methods.name: itemMoved
methods.comment: Notification that an item was moved.

params.name: parentPath
params.comment: the path of the folder that used to contain the item.

params.name: newParentPath
params.comment: the path of the folder that the item was moved to.

params.name: newName
params.comment: the new name of the item.

methods.name: itemChanged
methods.comment: Notfication that an item's state has changed.

params.name: parentPath
params.comment: the path of the folder containing the item.

params.name: itemName
params.comment: the name of the item that has changed.

name: FileSystemListener
comment:
FileSystemListener provides a listener the ability 
 to be notified of folder and file changes within a FileSystem.
